item.title: 必和必拓向盎格鲁集团的高风险倾斜使监管机构成为焦点
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd. ）对英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的大胆收购如果按计划取得成功，将重塑全球采矿业的格局，而在决定最终结果的过程中，从中国到南非和日本的反垄断机构很可能会像股东一样发挥重要作用。【原文：BHP Group Ltd.’s audacious approach for Anglo American Plc stands to reshape the global mining industry if it succeeds as planned, and antitrust authorities from China to South Africa and Japan are likely to play as important a role as shareholders in determining the final outcome.】

item.description: 由于地区政策制定者加大了干预力度并发表了更多言论，亚洲货币将迎来近两个月来表现最好的一周。【原文：Asian currencies are poised for their best week in nearly two months as regional policymakers increased their intervention efforts and rhetoric.】

item.title: 泰国通胀率七个月来首次转正
item.description: 在政府允许石油零售商提高柴油价格，以及灼热的热浪导致新鲜食品和蔬菜价格上涨之后，泰国的通货膨胀率七个月来首次转正。【原文：Thailand’s inflation turned positive for the first time in seven months after the government allowed oil retailers to raise diesel price and fresh food and vegetables turned more expensive due to a searing heat wave.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚大学抗议者的投资策略是错误的
item.description:
减持几股股票并不能推动公司或市场的发展。持有大笔股份并在谈判桌上获得积极的发言权才能带来真正的压力。【原文：

Divesting a few shares won’t move companies or markets. Taking big stakes and gaining an activist voice at the table is what brings real pressure.

】

item.title: 法国兴业银行利润超出预期，股票市场助推业绩增长
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）股票交易员的业绩连续第四个季度超过债券交易员，该部门的收入帮助这家法国银行在截至 3 月份的三个月里实现了超出预期的利润。【原文：Societe Generale SA equities traders outshone their bond-trading counterparts for a fourth straight quarter, with revenue from the unit helping the French bank beat estimates for profit in the three months through March.】

item.title: 科塔克的马尼安与联邦银行高管竞争首席执行官职位
item.description: 据知情人士透露，联邦银行（Federal Bank Ltd）的印度贷款机构负责人候选人名单中，除了本周从科塔克-马恒达银行（Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd）辞职的 K.V.S Manian 之外，还有两名内部人士。【原文：Federal Bank Ltd’s list of candidates to head the Indian lender features two insiders alongside K.V.S Manian, who resigned this week from Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国就业报告将显示就业持续大幅增长
item.description: 预测人员预计，美国就业月度报告将显示，4 月份就业继续保持强劲增长，即使工资压力继续放缓。【原文：Forecasters expect a monthly report on US employment to show strong job growth continued in April, even as wage pressures kept moderating.】

item.title: 欧洲东部的生活水平将很快超过地中海俱乐部
item.description: 苏联解体近 40 年后，脱离苏联轨道加入欧盟的国家的生活水平将超过欧盟南部国家。【原文：Almost four decades after the Soviet Union collapsed, living standards in the countries that broke free from its orbit to join the European Union are set to leapfrog the bloc’s south.】

item.title: 民调显示瑞士选民将支持限制医疗费用
item.description: 据初步民意调查显示，两项旨在限制瑞士公民医疗费用的倡议有望在下个月的全国投票中获得通过。【原文：Two initiatives designed to limit what Swiss citizens have to pay for health care are on track to pass in a national vote next month, according to a preliminary poll.】

item.title: 美国原油的加入改变了全球最重要的石油价格
item.description: 在经历了多年的怀疑、批评和贸易商的骚动之后，由于得克萨斯州西部原油的注入，世界上最重要的石油价格比以往任何时候都更加有效。【原文：After years of skepticism, criticism and trader furore, the world’s most important oil price is working better than ever thanks to an infusion of crude from west Texas.】

item.title: 在印尼盾疲软的情况下，外国投资者可能继续撤离印尼股市
item.description: 在印尼央行意外加息对提振印尼货币的影响微乎其微之后，全球基金准备继续抛售印尼股票。【原文：Global funds are poised to continue selling Indonesian stocks after the central bank’s surprise interest-rate hike had minimal impact in boosting the nation’s currency.】

item.title: 港股创 2018 年以来最长连胜纪录
item.description: 香港股市创下 2018 年以来最长连胜纪录，更有迹象表明，去年表现最差的市场之一正在复苏。【原文：Hong Kong stocks are on their longest-winning streak since 2018, adding to signs that a recovery in one of the worst-performing markets last year is well underway.】

item.title: 澳大利亚棉花生产商竞购战升温，路易-德雷福斯回绝 Olam 收购要约
item.description: 路易达孚公司（Louis Dreyfus Co.【原文：Louis Dreyfus Co. won’t support Olam Agri Holding Ltd.’s offer for Namoi Cotton Ltd., as the bidding war between the two major agricultural commodities traders for the Australian producer heats up.】

item.title: 受利率前景影响，黄金创二月以来最差单周走势
item.description: 由于担心通胀风险持续存在，美联储可能需要比之前预期更长的时间来降低利率，黄金出现了两个多月以来的首次连续周跌幅。【原文：Gold headed for its first back-to-back weekly loss in more than two months on concerns that the Federal Reserve may take longer to cut interest rates than previously expected as inflation risks persist.】

item.title: 日元波动有可能破坏本年度最佳交易之一
item.description: 日本正在威胁破坏今年最有利可图的货币押注之一：借用日元投资新兴市场货币的套利交易。【原文：Japan is threatening to derail one of the most profitable currency bets this year: carry trades borrowing the yen to invest in emerging-market currencies.】

item.title: 德意志银行在亚洲大力招聘后公布财富目标
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）全球私人银行业务负责人表示，德意志银行计划在未来五年内将其为东南亚和中东地区富裕家族管理的资产增加一倍，以利用这两个地区超级富裕家族之间日益增长的联系。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG plans to double the assets it manages for rich families in Southeast Asia and the Middle East over the next five years, tapping growing ties between ultra-rich clans in both regions, the lender’s global private banking head said.】

item.title: 因需求担忧，石油将创二月以来最大单周跌幅
item.description: 由于有迹象表明需求减弱，石油创下自二月份以来的最大单周跌幅，这加剧了人们对欧佩克+将延长减产以支撑油价的猜测。【原文：Oil headed for its biggest weekly decline since February on signs of weakening demand, fueling speculation that OPEC+ will prolong output cuts to shore up prices.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美股前景依然乐观。苹果销售额令人惊喜。拜登称日本 "仇外"。华为资助美国大学研究市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US stock outlook remains rosy. Apple sales surprise. Biden calls Japan “xenophobic.” Huawei funds research at US universities. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 莫迪对印度国营企业的改革正吸引着满怀希望的投资者
item.description: 长期以来，印度的国营企业因长期效率低下和官僚作风僵化而声名狼藉，尽管这些企业在亚洲第三大经济体的几个主要行业中占据主导地位，但许多投资者却对它们望而却步。【原文：India’s state-run companies have long been infamous for chronic inefficiencies and sclerotic bureaucracy, which made them a no-go for many investors despite their dominance in several major industries in Asia’s third-largest economy.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，科技股提振华尔街：市场综述
item.description: 在周五晚些时候公布关键的美国就业数据之前，华尔街股市和债券周四大涨，亚洲股市早盘也将上涨。【原文：Equities in Asia were set for early gains after stocks and bonds rallied on Wall Street Thursday, ahead of crucial US jobs data due later Friday.】

item.title: 富国银行称美国正在幕后审查 Zelle 投诉
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）表示，美国当局正在仔细审查有关 Zelle 支付的消费者投诉是如何处理的，这是继较大的竞争对手摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）之后，承认对华盛顿热门政治话题的幕后关注。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. said US authorities are scrutinizing how consumer complaints about Zelle payments are handled, following larger rival JPMorgan Chase & Co. in acknowledging behind-the-scenes interest in what has been a hot political topic in Washington.】

item.title: 麦格理利润低于预期，大宗商品部门受拖累
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）的盈利未能达到预期，原因是大宗商品和全球市场业务的利润拖累了这家澳大利亚公司的业绩。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd.’s earnings missed estimates as profit from its commodities and global markets business dragged on the Australian firm’s performance.】

item.title: 苹果公司 1100 亿美元股票回购计划创美国历史之最
item.description: 作为世界上最大的公司之一，苹果公司刚刚宣布了有史以来美国最大的回购计划，称其董事会批准了 1100 亿美元的额外股票回购。【原文：In a move fitting for one of the largest companies in the world, Apple Inc. just announced the biggest US buyback ever, saying its board approved an additional $110 billion in share repurchases.】

item.title: 交易员将美联储首次全面降息提前至 11 月，以应对就业问题
item.description: 在周五公布关键的美国就业报告之前，债券交易员将美联储首次全面降息的预期提前了一个月，至11月。【原文：Bond traders pulled forward expectations for the Federal Reserve’s first full interest-rate cut by a month to November ahead of a key US jobs report on Friday.】

item.title: 市场在美联储账户中寻找日元干预迹象
item.description: 美联储各种账户的最新数据暗示了日本决策者在过去一周可能采取了两种潜在的货币干预措施，以支撑陷入困境的日元。【原文：Fresh data on the Federal Reserve’s various accounts hints at two potential ways Japanese policy makers may have funded currency interventions this past week to bolster the beleaguered yen.】

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯告诉自由党，欧洲央行现在更有可能在 2024 年进行三次降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，欧洲中央银行今年可能会三次而不是四次降低借贷成本。【原文：The European Central Bank will probably lower borrowing costs three times this year instead of four, according to Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras.】

item.title: 安进公司首席执行官介绍实验性肥胖症药物的最新进展后股价大涨
item.description: 安进公司（Amgen Inc. ）首席执行官表示，该公司肥胖症实验药物 MariTide 的早期研究结果令他 "非常振奋"，公司股价在尾盘飙升。【原文：Amgen Inc.’s shares soared in late trading after its chief executive officer said he was “very encouraged” by early results from a study of the company’s experimental obesity drug, MariTide.】

item.title: Albemarle 计划举行更多锂拍卖会，以揭开价格神秘面纱
item.description: 作为全球最大的电池金属生产商，Albemarle 公司正计划进行更多的锂拍卖，包括在中国以外的地区进行一些拍卖。【原文：Albemarle Corp. is planning to do more lithium auctions — including some outside China — as the world’s largest producer of the battery metal aims to shed more light on pricing in the opaque market.】
